T.query: select md.id as mdid,  d.id as did,  i.id as iid, a.id as aid from medidata_depots md join depots d on d.medidata_depot_id = md.id join unnumbered_inventory_items i on d.id = i.depot_id join lots l on i.lot_id = l.id join article_types a on l.article_type_id = a.id where md.id = 317 or d.id = 531 or i.quantity =75 or d.emails = 'hvardhinedi@mdsol.com'or i.study_id = 382 or l.id = 1060 or l.expiry_date > '2025-01-01' or l.released_at ='2015-06-02' or a.name = 'Un1' and l.article_type_id =1264 ;

F.query: select md.id as mdid,  d.id as did,  i.id as iid, a.id as aid from medidata_depots md join depots d on d.medidata_depot_id = md.id join unnumbered_inventory_items i on d.id = i.depot_id join lots l on i.lot_id = l.id join article_types a on l.article_type_id = a.id where md.id = 317 or d.id = 530 or i.quantity =75 or d.emails = 'hvardhinedi@mdsol.com'or i.study_id = 382 or l.id = 1060 or l.expiry_date > '2025-01-01' or l.released_at ='2015-06-02' or a.name = 'Un1' and l.article_type_id =1264 ;

select md.id as mdid,  d.id as did,  i.id as iid, a.id as aid from medidata_depots md join depots d on d.medidata_depot_id = md.id join unnumbered_inventory_items i on d.id = i.depot_id join lots l on i.lot_id = l.id join article_types a on l.article_type_id = a.id where md.id = 317 or d.id <> 531 or i.quantity =75 or d.emails = 'hvardhinedi@mdsol.com'or i.study_id = 382 or l.id = 1060 or l.expiry_date > '2025-01-01' or l.released_at ='2015-06-02' or a.name = 'Un1' and l.article_type_id =1264 ;

select md.id as mdid,  d.id as did,  i.id as iid, a.id as aid from medidata_depots md join depots d on d.medidata_depot_id = md.id join unnumbered_inventory_items i on d.id = i.depot_id join lots l on i.lot_id = l.id join article_types a on l.article_type_id = a.id where md.id = 317 or (d.id = 531 and d.active_for_drug_shipping = 'f') or i.quantity =75 or d.emails = 'hvardhinedi@mdsol.com'or i.study_id = 382 or l.id = 1060 or l.expiry_date > '2025-01-01' or l.released_at ='2015-06-02' or a.name = 'Un1' and l.article_type_id =1264 ;
